{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2100G |revision=V5 (Module 5) |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/02/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |image1=vigor2100g-case.jpg |availability=Discontinued |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I4L-MS6833B |pcb_id=401-2100000-50 |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C2510A |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Excel Semi |fla1_model=ES29LV160EB-70TG |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9864G2GH-6 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pad header,, J5 |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, P3 |wi1_module=MSI MS-6833B |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561;RT2561ST; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_user=''blank'' |default_pass=''blank'' |oui=00:1D:92 |oui_eth=00:50:7F }}
:Models: [[DrayTek]] V2100VG / V2200VG V5
"P/N:401-2100000-50" and "60616" is silkscreened on the board.
==Images== <gallery> File:vigor2100g-case.jpg|case File:vigor2100g-case_back.jpg|case back File:vigor2100g-case_bottom.jpg|case bottom File:vigor2100g-board_top.jpg|board top File:vigor2100g-board_top_nowifi.jpg|board top (no wifi) File:vigor2100g-soc_switch.jpg|soc, switch File:vigor2100g-jtag_uart.jpg|jtag, uart File:vigor2100g-board_bottom.jpg|board bottom File:vigor2100g-minipci_top.jpg|minipci top File:vigor2100g-minipci_bottom.jpg|minipci bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
